# BGTaskScheduler.Error.Code.tooManyPendingTaskRequests

**Case**

A task scheduling error that indicates there are too many pending tasks of the type requested.

## Declaration

```swift
case tooManyPendingTaskRequests
```

## Discussion

Try canceling some existing task requests and then resubmit the request that failed.

## Identifying an error

- **BGTaskScheduler.Error.Code.notPermitted**: A task scheduling error that indicates the app isn’t permitted to launch the task.
- **BGTaskScheduler.Error.Code.unavailable**: A task scheduling error that indicates the app or extension can’t schedule background work.
- **BGTaskScheduler.Error.Code.immediateRunIneligible**: A task scheduling error that indicates a task request didn’t run immediately due to system conditions.
